sessions.title: Opening Keynote: The Future of Distributed Systems
sessions.description: An overview of current trends in distributed systems, including edge computing, serverless architectures and observability.

sessions.title: Practical Kubernetes for Platform Engineers
sessions.description: Deep dive into building internal platforms on top of Kubernetes, including multi-tenant clusters, security boundaries and GitOps workflows.

sessions.title: Observability Patterns: Traces, Metrics and Logs
sessions.description: How to design an observability strategy that scales with your organisation, with real-world examples and patterns.

sessions.title: Building Resilient APIs
sessions.description: Techniques and patterns for creating APIs that can gracefully handle failure, spikes and dependency outages.

sessions.title: Async Messaging with Kafka and Beyond
sessions.description: When and how to use Kafka and other messaging technologies to decouple services and handle high-throughput events.
